exercise.name: yoga_one
exercise.explanation: Bridge Pose - This pose helps controlling high blood pressure, sleeping disorder, headaches, and reduces backaches

exercise.name: yoga_two
exercise.explanation: Eagle Pose - This pose can ward off stress by improving focus and balance

exercise.name: yoga_three
exercise.explanation: Extended Triangle Pose - This pose is an excellent stress reliever and helps improve digestion

exercise.name: yoga_four
exercise.explanation: Cow Pose - This pose help relieves stress and calms the mind

exercise.name: yoga_five
exercise.explanation: Standing Forward Bend - This pose help relieve stress, fatigue and mind depression
